SlimMulticastSocket Class Reference

SlimMulticastSocket is a class to encapsulate a UDP multicast socket to send datagrams to and receive datagrams from an multicast group. More...

Detailed Description

SlimMulticastSocket is a class to encapsulate a UDP multicast socket to send datagrams to and receive datagrams from an multicast group.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SlimMulticastSocket::SlimMulticastSocket (  void   ) 
 

Construct a new SlimMulticastSocket object. To be able to send and recieve data, the socket must be opened via open(char *group, int port)

See also:
open(char *group, int port)

SlimMulticastSocket::SlimMulticastSocket (  const char *  group,
int  port
) 
 

Construct a new SlimMulticastSocket object, pre-configured to work with the multicast group group on port port To be able to send and recieve data, the socket must be opened via open() or open(char *group, int port)

See also:
open()

open(char *group, int port)

Member Function Documentation

int SlimMulticastSocket::open (  const char *  group,
int  port
) 
 

Initialize, open the socket and join the multicast group specified by group on port port To be able to send and recieve data, the socket must be opened via open() or open(int port)

Initialize, open the socket and join the multicast group defined while calling constructor SlimMulticastSocket(char *group, int port)
